    • stateClasses

    GateMenuItem(type, contextMenu, parentSVG)

    Menu item that has a custom click callback function that adds a Gate of the specified type to the Canvas

    new GateMenuItem(type, contextMenu, parentSVG)
    contextMenu.js, line 86

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    type string

    type of the gate Gate (and, or, ...)
    contextMenu ContextMenu

    instance of the ContextMenu that this item belongs to
    parentSVG Canvas

    instance of Canvas this menu belongs to
